t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: The Complete Guide to Amazon’s Private Label Brands | Pattern
s: Amazon introduced its first in-house brands—AmazonBasics and Pinzon, which both sell everyday household goods—in 2009. Only in the past few years, however, has the company ramped up its focus on private label creation.

t: Amazon is dropping dozens of in-house brands you didn’t even know it owned | The Verge
s: August 10, 2023 - Amazon is getting rid of dozens of in-house clothing brands as it faces a potential antitrust lawsuit from the FTC, according to a report from The Wall Street Journal.

t: The Life and Death of the Amazon Brands
s: August 15, 2023 - They sold well, and Amazon spent the next decade quietly expanding its house brands under dozens of inconspicuous names — Goodthreads, Solimo, Pinzon, Lark & Ro, Mama Bear, and Presto, to name a few — targeting thousands of high-demand categories with mostly budget-conscious items.

t: In-Depth Study of All 92 Amazon Private Label Brands
s: Amazon stated in 2019 that they have 158,000 private brand products across 45 brands. However, The Wall Street Journal reported in 2023 that dozens of brands were being phased out, leaving Amazon with fewer than 20 house brands, particularly in apparel and furniture.

t: Did You Know? Amazon Owns Scores of Private Label and Exclusive Brands - SellerEngine
s: January 6, 2023 - Here’s what you need to know about the Amazon Private Label project and the army of exclusive brands that joined it.

t: Amazon Slashes Dozens of In-House Brands. Did Your Favorite Line Get Cut?
s: August 11, 2023 - Over the past year, the company has decided to eliminate 27 out of 30 clothing brands alone, including private labels such as Lark & Ro, Daily Ritual and Goodthreads. As the brands phase out, only Amazon Essentials, Amazon Collection and Amazon Aware will remain in the clothing sector.

t: How Amazon’s big private-label business is growing and leaving small brands to protect against knockoffs
s: October 12, 2022 - Amazon continues to invest in private labels such as AmazonBasics, despite accusations that the company copies some of its top-selling third-party products.

t: Create AI-optimized TV advertising campaigns with Brand+ | Amazon Ads
s: January 27, 2025 - With Brand+, marketers can deliver video ads across Amazon's properties such as Prime Video and Twitch, as well as premium video publishers like Buzzfeed, Fox Corporation, and Dotdash Meredith, to customers likely to convert over time, while achieving awareness goals like reach and frequency.

t: Brand+ and Performance+ Now Available in Amazon DSP Globally | Amazon Ads
s: March 21, 2025 - Amazon DSP introduces Brand+ and Performance+: AI-powered tools that simplify campaign management and optimize for your goals.

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Creating and maintaining a Brand Store is free, and you do not need to advertise on Amazon to create a Brand Store. Once you create a Brand Store, you can showcase your products, brand story, and lifestyle content to engage shoppers.

t: Sponsored Brands – Increase brand awareness | Amazon Ads
s: Sponsored Brands promotes discovery and consideration of brands by using static and video brand creatives in the shopper journey, helping drive traffic to your Brand Store or product detail page.

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

t: Amazon Brand Registry - Amazon.com
s: Please Enable Cookies to Continue · New to Amazon · Create your Amazon account · English (US) © 1996-2025, Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates

t: Our Brands @ Amazon.com
s: Online shopping for Our Brands Directory: Amazon Private Brands at Amazon.com

t: Amazon Has a New Way to Prove That TV Ads Drive Sales
s: January 27, 2025 - The new tool, Brand+, boosted sales by 10% during beta testing, the company said.

t: Amazon Ads Launches Brand+, A Way For Marketers To Leverage Shopping, Browsing And Streaming Data From Amazon’s Total Footprint
s: January 27, 2025 - Amazon Ads is rolling out Brand+, a new offering for marketers combining "trillions of signals" from shopping, browsing and streaming across Amazon platforms.

t: Amazon brand usage guidelines for 3-party display ads | Amazon Ads
s: Using the Amazon.com name or branding elements can help you get results. Learn more about our brand use guidelines.

t: Brand Innovation Lab: Custom advertising solutions | Amazon Ads
s: Launch custom advertising campaigns with Brand Innovation Labs to engage consumers at multiple stages of the marketing funnel, building brand awareness, consideration, and conversion.

t: Requirements and tips for enrolling a brand in Amazon Brand Registry - Sell on Amazon
s: June 4, 2024 - Before you enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry, review eligibility requirements and other key information.
